entry.title: niteshpal-25/TodoApp-Frontend: Todo App is a simple, efficient, and lightweight task management application built using the FastAPI framework. It allows users to create, read, update, and delete tasks in a to-do list, making it easy to manage daily tasks or project to-do items.
entry.content: Todo App is a simple, efficient, and lightweight task management application built using the FastAPI framework. It allows users to create, read, update, and delete tasks in a to-do list, making it easy to manage daily tasks or project to-do items.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
entry.content: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

entry.title: buildwizai/image-sequence-animator: A lightweight React component for animating a sequence of images with playback controls, mimicking a video-like experience. Ideal for product showcases, interactive tutorials, or frame-by-frame animations.
entry.content: A lightweight React component for animating a sequence of images with playback controls, mimicking a video-like experience. Ideal for product showcases, interactive tutorials, or frame-by-frame animations.

entry.title: skrijwan100/simple-auth-kit: A lightweight and reusable authentication package for Node.js projects using MongoDB, JWT, and bcrypt. Just connect your MongoDB URI and you're ready to register or login users with a few lines of code.
entry.content: A lightweight and reusable authentication package for Node.js projects using MongoDB, JWT, and bcrypt. Just connect your MongoDB URI and you're ready to register or login users with a few lines of code.

entry.title: blessedux/Dobber_agent_launchpad: DOBBER is a lightweight, modular agent framework that lets AI securely manage revenue-generating DePIN devices. Built for real-world automation, it enables on-chain coordination, reward routing, and intelligent operations—turning physical machines into autonomous digital businesses. DEMO: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZXGQbEimumg
entry.content: DOBBER is a lightweight, modular agent framework that lets AI securely manage revenue-generating DePIN devices. Built for real-world automation, it enables on-chain coordination, reward routing, and intelligent operations—turning physical machines into autonomous digital businesses. entry.title: TBJr/evolvtech-invoicing-system: 💼 Evolvtech Invoicing — A lightweight, web-based invoicing application built with Vite, React, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase. Authenticated users can generate, manage, and download PDF invoices securely. Fully deployable to Vercel.
entry.content: 💼 Evolvtech Invoicing — A lightweight, web-based invoicing application built with Vite, React, Tailwind CSS, and Firebase. Authenticated users can generate, manage, and download PDF invoices securely. Fully deployable to Vercel.
